publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4022 Mr Jim Wallace: Sexual Offences Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the principle of protecting society from persons who pose a risk of causing sexual harm and agrees that the provisions within the Sexual Offences Bill that relate to devolved matters and which re-enact the Sex Offenders Act 1997, extend the categories of offenders required to register, increase restrictions on sex offenders and strengthen the notification requirements and operation of the Sex Offenders' Register should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S1M-4022 Mr Jim Wallace: Sexual Offences Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament endorses the principle of protecting society from persons who pose a risk of causing sexual harm and agrees that the provisions within the Sexual Offences Bill that relate to devolved matters and which re-enact the Sex Offenders Act 1997, extend the categories of offenders required to register, increase restrictions on sex offenders and strengthen the notification requirements and operation of the Sex Offenders’ Register should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry
